Hi a=
ll!

I have the same problem with the size of some of the logs created by
W=
CT (Web Curator Tool). I can't upgrade the WCT versi=F3n neither
embebed he=
ritrix versi=F3n ( 1.8 ).

Some days ago i tried to harvest a web page whic=
h produced lots of uri
errors (many of them were socket timeout exceptions,=
 so nothing
relevant) and some local errors too. The fact is that when this=
 web 
reached at the point of having 113Gb downloaded, the size os the .log=

files directory was nearly 1Tb !

So, my question is; is there any anyway =
to decrease the info storaged
in this log files or they may be that way by =
fact?

I noticed that modifying the file heritrix.properties into
aheritrix=
-1.8.0.jar and refining the trace level with OFF; could by
one of he ways:
=



--- aheritrix-1 .8.0. heritrix.properties-jar---------------------------=
-

Currently # necessary (?) For standard logs to work
crawl.level =3D OFF
=
Runtime-errors.level =3D OFF
Local-errors.level =3D OFF
Uri-errors.level =
=3D OFF
Progress-statistics.level =3D OFF
recover.level =3D OFF
-----------=
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

=
But i didn=B4t noticed any change in other harvestings, so i don=B4t think
=
that=B4s the way.

Any ideas around this?


Thanks again for your help.

Un=
